button.description: A styled button component used throughout the application.

card.description: A styled container for displaying content.

input.description: A styled input field for user input.

label.description: A styled label for form elements.

textarea.description: A styled textarea for multi-line input.

progress.description: A component that visually represents progress.

adminSignup.description: Handles the organization account creation process.

adminDashboard.description: Displays the dashboard for the admin.

report.description: Generates and displays the final report for the admin.

diagnosticChat.description: Facilitates the diagnostic chat for department heads.

resultsPage.description: Displays the results of the diagnostic analysis for a specific department.
